DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety of an approved drug on asthma symptoms in patients with chronic asthma which is also active during the allergy season.
DOC.brief_title: Study of an Approved Drug in Patients With Asthma (0476-289)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Asthma symptoms brought on by allergies Patient has any lung disease Currently have a sinus infection or cold symptoms
